results.name: Transformed Bernoulli twin numbers.
comment: We define Bernoulli twin numbers C(n) via Bernoulli numbers B(n)=A027641(n)/A027642(n) as C(0)=1, 2C(1)=-1, 3C(2)=-1, C(2n-1)= -B(2n-2) and C(2n)=B(2n), n>1. The sequence is defined as a(n)=(n+1)!*C(n).
mathematica: c[n_?EvenQ] := BernoulliB[n]; c[n_?OddQ] := -BernoulliB[n-1]; c[1]=-1/2; c[2]=-1/3; a[n_] := (n+1)!*c[n]; Table[a[n], {n, 0, 21}] (* _Jean-François Alcover_, Aug 08 2012 *)
